resources.string: The passbook file is not available anymore
The passbook file has some invalid data
Do you want to delete the pass?
Add your first pass by clicking the (+) button below
Archive events which day has passed

"Pasbuk" came up with idea of managing and displaying passbook passes in a Androidish way. Some other apps try to imitate the passbook appearance found on iOS app and they don\'t take in mind what the user is familiar to. As a Android user, in my case, I wanted to see the pass info following Apple\'s passbook format but in a Androidish way :). Since material was born and applied to android guidelines, there were no excuses to not make a beautiful passbook app!
Click and be part of it
Here you can give me your feedback or concerns
This pass does not allow updates
Sorry, this pass is not supported yet
You have to give permission to the camera to use this functionality
You have to give permission to the location to use this functionality
You have to give permission to the storage to use this functionality
